data.subject: 首存滿千送500現金,指定經銷介紹好友再領588現金
data.subject_eng: Free 500 cash for the first deposit of over 1,000, designated dealers to introduce friends and then receive 588 cash

data.subject: 今天的例行維護作業完畢 遊戲皆可以正常運行了。 請清除暫存在登入遊戲~謝謝
data.subject_eng: Today's routine maintenance work is completed, the game can run normally. Please clear the temporary login game~Thank you
